summary: Gives Anise the witch a Satanic Bible. And a spell.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [b] Description [/b]

Both of these files are independent and stand alone. Use one or both. Use none if you wish.

[url=http://www.thesatanicbiblefree.com] [b] Satanic Bible [/b] [/url]

 Anise\'s cabin has a [url=http://www.thesatanicbiblefree.com] Satanic Bible [/url] in it now. [u]Kill[/u] the witch, [u]take[/u] her house. Evil reward for an evil deed.
The book has a few quotes. Skill book to boot.

[url=http://alleeshadowtradition.com/pdf/necronomicon2.pdf] [b] Necronomicon [/b] [/url] 

Find the [url=http://alleeshadowtradition.com/pdf/necronomicon2.pdf] Necronomicon [/url] in the cellar. It will give you the power to send Hell\'s Fire upon your enemies. Book respawns for collector value. [i]teh-he[/i]
The Hell\'s Fire spell does 42 base damage and costs 1 pt/sec due to it being fire from hell. The magic consumption is so low because it is only used to direct the flames. Enemies cannot resist/absorb/reflect it\'s effects.

If you are offended by this, please [u]don\'t[/u] download.

[color=yellow] If you like this mod, you might like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32365] Evil book replacer for reading animations [/url]. [/color]

[b] Install [/b]

NMM is easy. If you use something else, I trust you know how to use it. 

Manual is easy, too. Unpack with Winrar to add my Data folder to your Skyrim folder. Merge and anything else it asks. Tick Satanic Bible.esp and/or Necromonicon.esp in default launcher.

[b] Credits [/b]

Bethesda
Anton Szandor LaVey
Simon
Nexus Forums
Gimp
QAbook
MurdermiesteR (me)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28391] Comic Shop [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27330] Deathlight [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27316] Repulsor Beam [/url] [/center]
author: Murdermiester
